Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' across all cases in the journal review process
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that include 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' as a terminal or near-terminal activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' directly follows 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences that are preceded by an EIC acceptance decision (e.g., 'RW-EIC Accept' or 'SW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' compared to the frequency of 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' in accepted manuscript trajectories
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' appears only after at least one revision cycle (i.e., after any 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation')
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Ratio of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurrences to total number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' events
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Number of process variants in which 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurs exactly once and marks the transition to production
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities that occur within 7 days of a preceding 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' in variants that originate from manuscripts initially rejected but later resubmitted and accepted
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Resubmission Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of all accepted manuscripts (ending with 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch') that passed through 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' at least once during their lifecycle
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of times 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' is reached without any prior occurrence of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not occur

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' that eventually lead to 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' relative to the total number of final disposition activities (e.g., 'SW-EIC Reject', 'SW-EIC Accept', etc.)
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs
